transcript.text:
￼














Products

Pricing Setup
Product Pricing

5 min
overview & purpose after adding all the products, if you are looking to change the price of certain products from a margin then this section allows you to change the price of the products without any hassle simply select any product from the dropdown, select the price type and the system will show you the product price list this screen gives quick access to all the prices of every product; each of its product options and product options rules manage product prices from this tab, admin can manage the product wise product prices and additional option sizes based on the different sizes available managing the prices is a 3 easy step matter select product instead of surfing down to a single product in admin panel, this panel allows you to select the product of which you want to change the price from the dropdown, select the product the system will list down all the listed products on your web store thus, giving you easy access select price type in addition, the system has provision to change both product price as well as the additional options price product price this is the price of product entered in price section of the product product additional option price this is the price of all additional options entered in the attribute price section of all the additional options note the product prices under additional options price will only be displayed if you have added the product’s additional options after the selection of product and price, the following option to select user type is displayed select user type select the user type for whom you want to change or update the prices default store price this will change the product price for all the default store customers all stores this will change the product price common for all store clients specific store this option will help you change/update the product prices for any specific store (if any added)
Did this page help you?
